traits.name: Goal-Oriented
traits.action: Set and track research milestones using SMM’s progress tracker to showcase ambition.

traits.name: Strength
traits.description: Enhances mental resilience for scientific challenges.
traits.action: Lead a high-pressure research project to demonstrate fortitude.

traits.name: Accurate
traits.action: Calibrate lab equipment to highlight accuracy in experiments.

traits.name: Logical Reasoning
traits.description: Aids in solving complex scientific problems.
traits.action: Apply logical reasoning in a data analysis project to showcase expertise.

traits.name: Spatially Aware
traits.action: Create 3D visualizations for a research project to display spatial skills.

traits.name: Dexterity
traits.action: Streamline lab procedures to demonstrate dexterity.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: Boosts stamina for fieldwork or long lab hours.
traits.action: Maintain a fitness routine to sustain energy in research roles.

traits.name: Melodic
traits.description: Enhances research presentations with engaging tones.
traits.action: Use vocal clarity in a scientific conference to captivate audiences.

traits.name: Artistic Sensitivity
traits.action: Create polished data charts to showcase aesthetic skills.

traits.name: Creativity
traits.action: Propose a novel experiment in a team meeting to highlight creativity.

traits.action: Share observational insights in a lab discussion to demonstrate skill.

traits.name: Communication
traits.action: Deliver a research talk to showcase communication skills.
